title: Griffon
contents: property | Senses | darkvision 60 ft., passive Perception 15
description | Keen Sight | The griffon has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.
description | Multiattack | The griffon makes two attacks: one with its beak and one with its claws.
description | Beak | Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage.
description | Claws | Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage.
